title: Evergreen Donation
subtitle: This could be your last chance to give a warm blanket to a freezing Rohingyan refugee. We will be departing on 15th Nov to distribute blankets to the adults and sweaters to the children in the chilly Rohingyan camps and remote villages of Bangladesh. Please dig deep. pic.twitter.com/mtUFIgSn5w
